channel.title: CVE Feed for RoamWiFi Technology Co., Ltd. -- RoamWiFi R10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for RoamWiFi Technology Co., Ltd. -- RoamWiFi R10

item.title: CVE-2024-32051|2024-04-24T05:45:13.121Z -- RoamWiFi Technology Co., Ltd. -- RoamWiFi R10
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into log file issue exists in RoamWiFi R10 prior to 4.8.45. If this vulnerability is exploited, a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker with access to the device may obtain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-31406|2024-04-24T05:45:37.291Z -- RoamWiFi Technology Co., Ltd. -- RoamWiFi R10
item.description: Active debug code vulnerability exists in RoamWiFi R10 prior to 4.8.45. If this vulnerability is exploited, a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker with access to the device may perform unauthorized operations.
